text.0_Chapter, 1_Verse: In those days when Ahasuerus sat on his throne
text.0_Chapter, 19_Verse: All women should respect their husbands
text.0_Chapter, 15_Verse: She's not just messing with you she's messing with all men
text.0_Chapter, 11_Verse: Vashti says, "No chance!" Ahasuerus became (not just mad) but super mad.
text.0_Chapter, 10_Verse: To bring Vashti with her crown to show off how beautiful she was
text.0_Chapter, 9_Verse: On the seventh day when Ahasuerus was wasted he called his seven advisors
text.0_Chapter, 21_Verse: The decree is: Husband is in charge, wife has to speak his language.
text.0_Chapter, 16_Verse: If Vashti can diss you, who knows what's next?
text.0_Chapter, 7_Verse: No peer pressure, drink what you want
text.0_Chapter, 4_Verse: Second party is for everyone in Shushan for seven days
text.0_Chapter, 6_Verse: Drank from gold cups and other different types of cups. There was a lot of wine.
text.0_Chapter, 2_Verse: In the third year he made a massive feast
text.0_Chapter, 3_Verse: Shows off his wealth for 180 days
text.0_Chapter, 8_Verse: Vashti made a seven day party
text.0_Chapter, 0_Verse: In the days of Ahasuerus he was in charge of 127 provinces
